name: Heritage (Eva Abollivier, Margot-M)
description:
The noble and glorious Supreme Galactic Emperor is dead. Anastasia Zeroldum, potiential heir to the throne, goes to the imperial castle where the will of the deceased is going to be read. But in a family as stupid as the Zeroldum's are, surprises tend to happen!

A comical adventure game where you can explore a sci-fi castle and meet all the members of a really weird imperial family.

Made in 7 days for the Become Better at Something Jam.

CREDITS

Margot Mathieu - Game design, writing and sound design

Eva Abollivier - Game design, art and code

"Basement Floor" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
